info.name: Prbal API for Bookings
info.description: API collection for the Prbal application, generated from Prbal-API.md. Covers user types: providers, customers, and admins.

item.name: Bookings

query.description: Filter by user role: provider or customer
Filter by booking status: pending, confirmed, in_progress, completed, cancelled, disputed
Order by: created_at, booking_date, amount (prefix with - for descending)

body.raw:
{
    "service": "{{service_id}}",
    "booking_date": "2024-12-25",
    "start_time": "10:00:00",
    "end_time": "12:00:00",
    "amount": "150.00",
    "address": "123 Main St, City, State",
    "latitude": "40.7128",
    "longitude": "-74.0060",
    "requirements": "Please bring your own tools and materials. Access through main entrance.",
    "notes": "Customer will be available from 9:30 AM onwards"
}

item.description: Endpoints for managing service bookings between customers and providers.

item.name: Calendar Integration
item.description: Endpoints for syncing bookings with external calendar services like Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook, and Apple Calendar.

item.name: Role-Based Status Updates
item.description: Role-based status update endpoints with different permissions for providers and customers.

item.name: Admin Operations
item.description: Admin-only endpoints for managing bookings, resolving disputes, and viewing all booking data.
